p: The ‘collection dates’ of 180 of the 190 n-rec N, C, and O phylogroup ORFs are known ( Supplementary Material); they range from 1938 to 2016 CE (15% are pre-2000 CE). However, several of the dated sequences, mostly from non-potato hosts and in the C phylogroup, behaved anomalously in TempEst analyses (see below), and so were removed to give the 162 ORF alignment used for Bayesian dating analyses. Fig. 2e is the SplitsTree diagram of the 162 ORFs alignment.
